name: Strobing Fungus
description: The Strobing Fungus is a medium-sized plant creature known for its ability to emit a powerful strobing light that dazzles and blinds those who gaze upon it.
memorable: Its strobing light can incapacitate foes, making it a unique control element in combat.
goals: To disable foes using its strobing light while delivering acid damage through its chemical burns.
relations: It may be found in battles alongside other magic-resistant or nature-themed creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark or damp areas where its light can affect visibility.
strengths: Condition immunity to being blinded, deafened, or frightened.
weaknesses: Limited mobility with a walk speed of only 10 feet and inability to communicate.
attacks: It can execute multiattacks with chemical burn that deals significant acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to emit a dazzling strobing light that can blind multiple creatures.
senses: Possesses blindsight 60 feet, allowing it to sense creatures even when unable to see.
additional_information: Can emit strobing light but cannot attack while doing so.
Requires a DC 14 Constitution saving throw to resist blindness from its strobe ability.
Chemical burn attacks have a reach of 5 feet or a range of 30/120 feet, dealing substantial acid damage.
test_queries: creature that emits blinding strobing light
fungus with acid damage and blinding ability
blinding light creature in dark environments
medium unaligned plant with chemical attacks
